```{r}
testdata=read.csv(file="~/Desktop/21Jan21_analysis/NSW3010_Basal_count_20Jan21.csv",header=TRUE)
testdata$BvsS<-"Basal"
testdata$Rep<-1
nobs=nrow(testdata)
for (i in 1:nobs) {
  if (is.na(testdata[i,3])) {
    testdata[i,1]<-fname
    testdata[i,2]<-CellID
    testdata[i,3]<-LC3PunctaCount
    testdata[i,4]<-LAMPObjCount
  } 
  else {
    fname=testdata[i,1]
    CellID=testdata[i,2]
    LC3PunctaCount=testdata[i,3]
    LMAPObjCount=testdata[i,4]
  }
}
```
